channel.title: How do u change str bonus on a delta server!

im wondering how do i chance the str bonus of a item/wepon/armour on a delta source please help
thanks

item.title: How do u change str bonus on a delta server!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

first go to your CONFIG folder
then go to item.cfg
item.cfg for example ID want to edit my DRAGON SCIMMY STR BONUS
SO ILL LOOK FOR IN ITEM CFG

Dragon_scimitar

or you can just search by item number
heres what you do
INGAME you remove all your items quipted and leave the item you want to edit look at the bonus for the strength
on item.cfg look for the number you saw
edit that number to the strength bonus you want

EXAMPLE

item = 4587 Dragon_scimitar A_vicious,_curved_sword. 100000 100000 80929.5918252946 8 67 -2 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 45 0
45 Strength bonus to 92!!

item = 4587 Dragon_scimitar A_vicious,_curved_sword. 100000 100000 80929.5918252946 8 67 -2 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 92 0
SAVE AND COMPILE AND RESTART SERVER AND THERE YOU HAVE IT!

Read full topic
